key_risks: Production and supply chain challenges, including semiconductor shortages and below-expectation production figures
Financial instability and reliance on external funding, particularly from the Saudi Arabian Public Investment Fund (PIF)
Intense competition in the luxury EV market from established players like Tesla and emerging rivals
Regulatory and environmental risks, including compliance with evolving regulations and battery recycling requirements
controversies: Allegations of unfair labor practices, including illegally firing employees for union support
Settlement with the National Labor Relations Board requiring Lucid to rescind layoffs and reinstate affected workers
environmental_issues: Compliance with evolving environmental regulations and battery recycling requirements could increase operational costs
social_issues: Allegations of unfair labor practices and damage to reputation due to labor controversies
governance_issues: Reliance on external funding from the Saudi Arabian Public Investment Fund (PIF) may not be sustainable in the long term
